alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 8:13PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Ada, southwestern Elmore and central Owyhee Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 813 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hammett to near Poison Creek Rec Site. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... C J Strike Dam, Hinton Reservoir, Poison Creek Rec Site and Rough Mountain around 820 PM MDT. Mountain Home, Mountain Home Air Force Base, Grand View and Doyle Mountain around 830 PM MDT. Oreana around 850 PM MDT. Cinder Cone Butte around 900 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley
